DOC.brief_summary: This study double-blind randomize , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , 12 week study perform 2 centre Sweden ass effect Omega-3 carboxylic acid fenofibrate liver fat measure magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) patient over-weight hypertriglyceridemia .
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind Randomized Placebo-controlled Study Comparing Epanova Fenofibrate Liver Fat Overweight Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent Men woman ≥40 year ≤75 year suitable vein cannulation repeat venepuncture Have serum triglyceride ≥1.7 mM Have liver fat content assess MRI > 5.5 % Have body mass index ( BMI ) > 25 ≤40 kg/m2 , History presence clinically significant disease disorder , opinion investigator , may either put subject risk participation study , influence result subject 's ability participate study . Creatinine clearance < 60 mL/min screening ( CockcroftGault formula ) . Severe hepatic insufficiency and/or significant abnormal liver function define aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) > 3x upper limit normal ( ULN ) and/or alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) > 3x ULN Total bilirubin > 2.0 mg/dL ( 34.2 µmol/L ) Type 2 diabetes , define WHO criteria e.g . fast plasma Glucose > 7.0 mM use antidiabetic therapy Any clinically significant abnormality clinical chemistry , haematology urinalysis result judge investigator . This include sign liver disease NAFLD motivate investigation treatment base clinical judgement Recent history ( past 12 month ) drug abuse alcohol abuse . Alcohol abuse define > 14 drink per week ( 1 drink = 35 cl beer , 14 cl wine , 4 cl hard liquor ) judge investigator
